title: Can Bill Richardson Free Brittney Griner and Paul Whelan?
description: The former New Mexico governor advised the family of one American freed from Russia and says he can help Ms. Griner and Mr. Whelan.
dc:creator: Michael Crowley
media:description: After Bill Richardson traveled to Moscow to win the release of the jailed Americans Brittney Griner and Paul Whelan, Biden officials signaled that his help was not welcome.
